web_snippets: Diogo is a member of the High Level Panel on Measurement of Innovation ... independent expert on the design and implementation of innovation and research strategy ...
Diogo de Carvalho is the Executive Director of INFRASAT, the independent government-owned company responsible for managing all satellite service portfolios ...
Diogo has a degree in Environmental Biology from the University of Lisbon (Portugal) and a Masters in Conservation Biology and PhD in Biodiversity Management ...
